description: Visualize Binary Search. Title 'What is Binary Search' - must START in CENTER then animate UP to top. Show 8 boxes labeled 1-8 at y=0. Search for 6. Show Target 6 at y=2.0. Step 1: Arrow to box 4, label Mid at y=1.2 NOT overlapping Target. Since 6 greater than 4, gray boxes 1-4. Step 2: New mid at 6, found - green. Remove old labels before adding new. Final: Binary Search is O log n in yellow centered.
youtube_title: IT`S VERIFIED!!! | Tidal Wave [NEW TOP 1] - in Perfect Quality (4K, 60fps) - Geometry Dash
title: Tidal Wave: A New King in Geometry Dash
